Greetings everyone,

I have recently reduced the price of the Mito Sukemitsu wakizashi on my website.  Also a wonderful Toryusai tsuba as well as a Kyo Shoami tsuba, published in the book "Ai-Tsuba 100 Shu", have been added to the tosogu page.  Please have a look if you have any interest. Thanks
